name: i made these when i was 8
name_original: i made these when i was 8
description:
a zip file including two folders, music and games...

if you are into really young people who tried to make things good but failed then this is for you, trust me it is BAD in a funny way... so bad it is good.

most credits are in instruction text file in game folders, if the song isn't credited it was because I was 8 and didn't know how that whole thing worked. (the instructions are the original instructions from the scratch page)

please comment any songs i forgot to credit when i was 8 pff.
